name: Solar Eclipse - Demo/Teaser
description:
‘Join Sol as they start a new page in their life: college. Make new friends, discover yourself, and maybe get into a little… mischief.’

The Solar Eclipse demo/teaser was created by MC Games in participation of NaNoRenO 2019. MC Games or Moose Cat Games consists of a pair of friends: Moose and LuCat. Production of the full game is underway but there is currently no concrete release date.

This is our first project together and we are still learning a lot of stuff! It's very short, but we hope you enjoy it. Thank you for checking it out.

Please let us know what you thought about our teaser in the comments below! :)

*Note* The music might be a tad too loud, you might want to start off with the volume in the middle. If you think the music is too loud, please also let us know that.
